ygData.subject: Re: Question on mob teleporting
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe that the Aviaks are now programmed to just jump off the edge.  I had the same experience as Gatlin, but this was about a month ago, with the aviaks
ygData.messageBody:
I believe that the Aviaks are now programmed to just jump off the edge. I had
the same experience as Gatlin, but this was about a month ago, with the aviaks
jumping out of the penthouse to chase us after i "Evac"ed to the ground.

Kaleid
23rd Song
<Wave of the Dark Tide>
Prexus

=====
"Thou shall not kill. Thou shall not commit
adultery. Don't eat pork."
I'm sorry, what was that last one? Don't eat pork? God has spoken. Is that the word of God or is that pigs trying to out smart everybody?"
-- Jon Stewart
